description:
Usopp`s naturally negative personality makes him the only Straw Hat who stands a chance against Perona`s depressing army of ghosts, and Chopper prepares to do battle against his hero, Dr. Hogback!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Usopp serait-il le plus fort ? Être négatif, c`est son affaire
Usopp`s the Strongest? Leave Anything Negative to Him!
Усопп – сильнейший? Оставьте негатив на меня
ウソップ最強? ネガティブは任せとけ
